thread.title: Zhejiang China Light & Textile Industrial City Group buys grey fabric and clothing related assets

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Zhejiang China Light & Textile Industrial City Group buys grey fabric and clothing related assets

organizations.name: zhejiang china light & textile industrial city group
reuters) - zhejiang china light & textile industrial city group co ltd

text:
March 2(Reuters) - Zhejiang China Light & Textile Industrial City Group Co Ltd
* Says it acquired grey fabric and clothing related assets
* Previous news was disclosed on Nov. 24, 2017
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/BQbZon
 (Beijing Headline News)
